data.prayer: Father, give the disciples of the the state of Devonshire an urgency of seeing every people and place reached for the gospel.
data.verse: As long as it is day, we must do the works of him who sent me. Night is coming, when no one can work.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Devonshire, Bermuda
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, give the believers of the the state of Devonshire unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.
Father, remind your church in Devonshire that they can know and depend on the love you have for them.
data.verse: We know and have believed the love which God has for us. God is love, and he who remains in love remains in God, and God remains in him.

data.prayer: Jesus, please send your Spirit to Devonshire, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Devonshire, Bermuda.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Devonshire, Bermuda to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Devonshire, Bermuda.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.section_summary:
the state of Devonshire, Bermuda has a population of 7,100.

We estimate Devonshire has 1,857 people who might know Jesus, 4,651 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 592 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.
